General.Name: Aktia Bank Abp
General.Description: Aktia Pankki Oyj, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the provision of banking and financing solutions to individuals, corporates, and institutions in Finland. It operates through three segments: Banking Business, Asset Management, and Group Functions. The company offers banking, financing, and financial advisory services, as well as investment products. It also provides life insurance, disability, and critical illness insurance products, as well as wealth management services. Aktia Pankki Oyj was founded in 1825 and is headquartered in Helsinki, Finland.
